page.title: 08FARMING WEST GRIMSTEAD FARM
page.content: This farm is run by Mr Read.The dairy man is Mr Crouch.The farm has 830 acres of farm land and 430 acres is corn.The other 400 is grass and silage.The farm owns 80 acres of woodland.The farm was a pig farm before 1964 but unfortunately it burnt down in a bad fire.After that the farm became sheep and cattle.Now the farm has about 40 sheep and 270 cattle and 160 cows are being milked.The breed of cow is a Canadian breed and it is called a Holstien.The farm has got 7 tractors.Mr Read likes John Deere tractors for the farm.
